about.title: About Gifteo
about.description1: Gifteo was born out of a simple but familiar problem ‚Äî forgetting important occasions and struggling to come up with meaningful gift ideas. Created by a university student as part of a bachelor‚Äôs final project, Gifteo is more than just an app ‚Äî it‚Äôs a personal solution turned into a platform that can help others, too.
about.description2: The project combines real-world needs with modern web technologies, focusing on usability, collaboration, and mobile-first design. From user research and design prototyping to coding and testing, every part of Gifteo has been developed with care, curiosity, and the goal of making gift-giving a little easier for everyone. And yes ‚Äî it‚Äôs completely free to use. Because great ideas deserve to be shared.
